results.definition: showing extreme cupidity; painfully desirous of another's advantages
examples: he was never covetous before he met her
jealous of his success and covetous of his possessions

results.definition: immoderately desirous of acquiring e.g. wealth
examples: they are avaricious and will do anything for money
casting covetous eyes on his neighbor's fields
prehensile employers stingy with raises for their employees
